attributes.action: Request a vote of no confidence in the current government, hold snap elections
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned demand that the Prime Minister and all of his current cabinet step-down, with immediate effect, and hold snap elections to vote in a new government.
attributes.background: Since coming into power through a majority vote in 2015 this government has lost the trust and confidence of many people. This includes the NHS workforce, other public sectors and the British population in general. We demand immediate snap elections to vote in a government with our best interests
